Title: Affords certain uniformed members of the fire department pension fund with an increased pension benefit for each year of additional service beyond their required minimum service
Summary: Affords certain uniformed members of the fire department pension fund with an increased pension benefit of one-fortieth of their average annual earnings for each year of additional service beyond his or her required minimum service.
LawCode: Amd ยง13-359, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to affording certain uniformed members of the fire department pension fund with an increased pension benefit for each year of additional service beyond their required minimum service
